Author: Seko#7408
Content:
Good RPG games are already running on NEO and Ethereum.  Others are announced.  The games industry is so big.  I used to make money with Flashgames, then with HTML5, so why not blockchain games?

It will take a few more years, but if blockchain technology is going to be successful, it will be games on the blockchain. The market is so big.

If you get started now, you can achieve something big.

My dream for now is a simple penalty shootout...
